program.name: Arts Management
program.description: The Arts Management program at NAFA equips students with the knowledge and skills to navigate the business side of the arts and cultural sector. It combines a strong foundation in arts and cultural studies with practical business management training, preparing graduates for roles in arts administration, event management, and cultural entrepreneurship.

memory.first_encounters: my friend was studying in the major and thus I am introduced to this major
memory.thoughts: I have many life long friends from NAFA and they are very nice! I have a chance to see different art events because the location is so good!
